verbs.description: Donald Trump Jr. [V: is] facing a major backlash from book publishers who refuse to take in his book as they are worried that the president 's son could be charged in special counsel Robert Mueller 's Russia investigation , according to Fox Business correspondent Charlie Gasparino .
